verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:18
verses.text: And Rehoboam took him Mahalath the daughter of Jerimoth the son of David to wife, and Abihail the daughter of Eliab the son of Jesse;

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:19
verses.text: Which bare him children; Jeush, and Shamariah, and Zaham.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:20
verses.text: And after her he took Maachah the daughter of Absalom; which bare him Abijah, and Attai, and Ziza, and Shelomith.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:21
verses.text: And Rehoboam loved Maachah the daughter of Absalom above all his wives and his concubines: (for he took eighteen wives, and threescore concubines; and begat twenty and eight sons, and threescore daughters.)
